{"url": "https://twitter.com/NildoOuriques/status/1317078534159060993", "date": "2020-10-16T12:22:47+00:00", "content": "sobre o d\u00e9ficit p\u00fablico\n\nO FMI anuncia que a d\u00edvida do Brasil ser\u00e1 a maior entre os pa\u00edses perif\u00e9ricos.
